name: FLITELINE AVIATION SCHOOL, INC.
about: Fliteline Aviation School Inc., based in the Philippines, is a premier institution dedicated to full-time pilot training. Our courses comply with the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines, Federal Aviation Authority, and International Civil Aviation Organization standards. We offer a range of dynamic courses, including Private Pilot Training, Commercial Pilot Training, Flight Instructor Course, and Instrument Rating. Our mission is to produce competent and proficient pilots through practical and passionate instruction. With CAAN accreditation, we welcome students from Nepal and other regions. Our services also include cargo flights, medical evacuation flights, and on-the-job training, ensuring a comprehensive aviation education. Choose Fliteline Aviation to embark on your flying journey with confidence and passion.
services:
["Private Pilot License (PPL)
Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Flight Instructor Course
Dynamic Packages"]
